alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 5:52PM EST until January 11 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Virginia...West Virginia... Shenandoah River at Millville affecting Jefferson, Warren and Clarke Counties. For the Shenandoah River...including Millville...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Shenandoah River at Millville. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Parts of Bloomery Road and John Rissler Road are flooded near Bloomery, West Virginia. Once these roads flood, access to homes is impaired but the homes themselves are not in any danger of flooding. Moulton Park and the Millville boat launch are also flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 3.0 feet, or 7.0 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Please visit weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Wed Wed Wed Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1AM 7AM 1PM Stg Time Date Shenandoah River Millville 10.0 3.0 Tue 5 pm 4.3 5.5 6.2 10.4 1pm Thu &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/washington or weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM EST.
